text: What is the full legal name of the disclosing party?
helpText: Enter the complete legal name as it appears on official documents (individual or company)

text: What is the complete address of the disclosing party?
helpText: Include street address, city, state, zip code, and country

text: What is the full legal name of the receiving party?
helpText: Enter the complete legal name as it appears on official documents

text: What is the complete address of the receiving party?
helpText: Include street address, city, state, zip code, and country

text: What type of confidential information will be shared?
helpText: Select the category that best describes the confidential information

text: How long should the confidentiality period last?
helpText: Choose the duration for which the information must remain confidential

text: Which state or country's laws should govern this agreement?
helpText: Select the jurisdiction for legal interpretation and enforcement

text: What is the full legal name of the landlord/property owner?
helpText: Enter the complete legal name as it appears on property documents

text: What is the landlord's complete mailing address?
helpText: Include street address, city, state, zip code for legal notices

text: What is the full legal name of the tenant?
helpText: Enter the complete legal name as it appears on identification documents

text: What is the tenant's current mailing address?
helpText: Address for correspondence and legal notices

text: What is the complete address of the rental property?
helpText: Include street address, unit number, city, state, and zip code

text: What is the monthly rent amount?
helpText: Enter the amount in USD (e.g., 1500)

text: What is the lease term duration?
helpText: Choose the duration of the lease agreement

text: What is the security deposit amount?
helpText: Typically equal to one month's rent

text: Which state's rental laws should govern this lease?
helpText: Select the state where the property is located

text: What is the complete legal name of Partner 1?
helpText: Full legal name as it appears on official documents

text: What is Partner 1's complete address?
helpText: Include street address, city, state, zip code

text: What is the complete legal name of Partner 2?
helpText: Full legal name as it appears on official documents

text: What is Partner 2's complete address?
helpText: Include street address, city, state, zip code

text: What is the official name of the partnership?
helpText: The legal business name for the partnership entity

text: How many total partners will be involved?
helpText: Select the total number of partners in the business

text: How will profits and losses be distributed?
helpText: Choose the method for sharing profits and losses

text: Which state should govern this partnership agreement?
helpText: Select the jurisdiction for legal matters and business registration

text: What is the full legal name of the employer/company?
helpText: Complete legal business name as registered

text: What is the employer's complete business address?
helpText: Principal place of business including street, city, state, zip

text: What is the employee's full legal name?
helpText: Complete legal name as it appears on official identification

text: What is the employee's complete address?
helpText: Current residential address for employment records

text: What is the official job title for this position?
helpText: The job title as it will appear in company records

text: What is the annual salary or hourly wage?
helpText: Enter compensation amount (e.g., 75000 for salary or 25.00 for hourly)

text: What type of employment classification is this?
helpText: Select the employment structure and payment basis

text: Which state's employment laws should govern this contract?
helpText: Select the jurisdiction for employment law compliance
